verses.name: Leviticus 25:19
verses.text: And the land shall yield her fruit, and ye shall eat your fill, and dwell therein in safety.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:20
verses.text: And if ye shall say, What shall we eat the seventh year? behold, we shall not sow, nor gather in our increase:

verses.name: Leviticus 25:21
verses.text: Then I will command my blessing upon you in the sixth year, and it shall bring forth fruit for three years.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:22
verses.text: And ye shall sow the eighth year, and eat yet of old fruit until the ninth year; until her fruits come in ye shall eat of the old store.
